page.title: 07COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: All households within the boundaries of Hullavington receive a free copy of the{Hullavington News}on a monthly basis. This typed communication is edited by Mrs.Margaret Roberts of Hullavington. A typical issue gives information about the different organisations & activities within the area, & provides a forum for discussing local events. Groups that use the News include:- Parish Church of St.Mary{Magdelen, {Hullavington Women's Guild, Royal {British Legion, Women's Institute, {Hall Management Committee, Community {Playgroup, Magpies, Village Hall '200' {Club, Hullavington Players, Mt.Zion {Christian Fellowship, R.A.F. Cub {Scouts & Brownies.}Typical entries are :-{"REFUSE is collected on Tuesdays." &{"DR.SILLARS holds surgery every {THURSDAY 9.00-10.00 a.m. in the Hall."
